Kakashi creates a bird of [[Fire Release|flame]]s under his complete control that quickly flies into a designated [[water]] source, burning hot enough to cause the water to evaporate. The bird disappears as soon as the water is gone. Alternatively, the bird can release streams of fire from its mouth for offensive purposes.

== Trivia ==
* When [[Nanara]] pretends to be a ninja, this is among his favourite techniques to use.
